did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two volumes containing the records of the First Congregational Church of Cincinnatus and the records of the Congregational Society and the Presbyterian Society.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: This congregation was known as the First Congregational Church of Cincinnatus from 1809-1840. It changed to the Presbyterian Church of Freetown in 1841.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two volumes containing the records of the First Congregational Church of Cincinnatus including a confession of faith, covenant, minutes (1809-1838), baptismal and membership lists, dismissals, excommunications and death registers; and the records of the Congregational Society (1809-1841) and the Presbyterian Society (1842-1885).
